desc: Fashionable, functional, cross-body phone necklaces. Shop our collection protective phone covers with woven, leather, nylon or braided cord straps. Stylish options to keep your phone easily accessible and safe. Superior quality crossbody cases for all models of Apple, Samsung and Huawei.

layout.text: MIX & MATCH with all our straps.
Choose an extra strap to match your style, outfit or mood!
